episode_summary: Michelle Berman-Michael discusses the importance of building loyalty and community on Instagram through storytelling. She emphasizes the need to move away from generic content and instead focus on personal stories that resonate with your audience. By leveraging the concept of neural coupling, agents can create memorable and engaging content that stands out in a crowded market.
